channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: White House forgives $4.5B in student debt for public service workers
item.description: The Biden administration announced Thursday that it's forgiving an additional $4.5 billion in student debt for more than 60,000 public sector employee...

item.title: CBS Faces ‘News Distortion’ Complaint Amid ’60 Minutes’ Harris Interview Edit Scandal
item.description: Americans have watched as the media outlets once trusted as objective news sources have fractured that faith with journalistic malpractice.

item.title: Who is Yahya Sinwar? The Israeli prisoner turned terrorist Hamas leader who is suspected dead
item.description: Sinwar rose to the top position after the killing of previous leader Ismail Haniyeh in the explosion of a guesthouse in Tehran on July 30.

item.title: Are Photos Finished?
item.description: Oversensitive politicians are trying to criminalize satirical images by labeling them ‘misinformation.’

item.title: Christian Realtor Persecuted For ‘Hate Speech’ After Posting Bible Verses On Facebook
item.description: There have been multiple cases of people having their careers harmed because they expressed their religious beliefs.

item.title: The Gods Await You at Paestum
item.description: Near Naples, it’s a case study in archaeology in Italy.

item.title: Cryptocurrency titans are spending big this election to stack Congress with allies
item.description: Super PACs for the cryptocurrency industry are funneling millions of dollars in advertising into key congressional races on both sides of the aisle.

item.title: Cardinal Dolan 'upset' that Harris skipping Al Smith Dinner

item.title: History Lessons from the Port Strike
item.description: The ILA and Harold Daggett have brought back one of the real dark sides of union power.

item.title: Biden-Harris Threat against Israel Is a Moral Disgrace
item.description: Warning that military aid could be suspended is a cynical political move that betrays our staunch ally and emboldens Iran and its terrorist proxies.

item.title: Houston’s Ongoing Homelessness Crisis Is A Damning Indictment Of ‘Housing First’ Policy
item.description: The problem with the Housing First approach to homelessness is that it's a one-size-fits-all policy that ignores human nature.

item.title: Democrats Let Unions Steal from My Sick Son — to Reelect Themselves
item.description: A new Michigan law turns home caregivers such as me into public employees — and allows public unions to take money from us.

item.title: Biden admin issues warning to Netanyahu as Israel holds emergency meeting on Gaza aid
item.description: The U.S. warned Israel on this week that it is "watching" Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's actions on delivering aid to Gaza.

item.title: Why Crunchy Moms And Independent Doctors Are Now Aligning With The Political Right
item.description: Voters from both sides of the aisle have found common ground in resisting everything from mandated childhood vaccines to food additives.

item.title: Kamala Harris’ Foreign Policy Would Make The World More Unstable Than It Already Is
item.description: There's no reason to believe the geopolitical issues breaking out now under Biden-Harris would be fixed by a Harris-Walz administration.
